Official website of the U.S. government
Discover
Government-wide Objective

Sustain Public Roadway System

Updated Jan 2026

Construction or maintenance of Public Roadway infrastructure system.

TransportationGround Transportation

Programs

32
+10 from Jan 2020

Total Expenditure

$2.6B
+23% from Jan 2020

Key

Each bubble is a program sized by how much the program has spent in FY 2024 so far—as of Jan 2026

Insight

32 programs are working toward this objective, spending a combined $2.6B in FY 2024. The largest program is the Appalachian Development Highway System ($100.7M). The smallest is the State and Community Highway Safety ($63.2M).
